title: NCMW: A Python Package to Analyze Metabolic Interactions in the Nasal Microbiome

creators.affiliation: Eberhard Karls University of Tübingen, Institute for Bioinformatics and Medical Informatics, Tübingen

description: pymCADRE is an advanced re-implementation of the metabolic Context-specificity Assessed by Deterministic Reaction Evaluation (mCADRE) algorithm in Python. It constructs tissue-specific metabolic models by leveraging gene expression data and literature-based evidence, along with network topology information.
